MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Pedra Branca Project in Brazil dated May 2019.pdf

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Pedra Branca Project in Brazil dated May 2019.pdf
document.description: This report provides a technical summary and resource estimation for the Pedra Branca platinum, palladium, and gold project in Ceará State, Brazil, commissioned by ValOre Metals Corp. and completed by Lions Gate Geological Consulting Inc.
